data.title: Glad Tidings Pint Sized Santa with Bell Figurine by Jim Shore Heartwood Creek
meta_keywords: Pint Sized Santa with Bell Figurine
data.meta_description:
NEW Glad Tidings Pint-Sized Santa with Bell from the Jim Shore Heartwood Creek Collection by Enesco.  Made of Stone Resin and 100 Polyester.  Measures 5 H.   
Title:  Glad Tidings              Introduction:  September 2013   
The affordable pint sized collection is a success with retailers and consumers alike. This whimsical Santa bearing gifts features a colorful floral applique pattern on his robe.
data.text:
NEW! Glad Tidings Pint-Sized Santa with Bell from the Jim Shore Heartwood Creek Collection by Enesco. Made of Stone Resin and 100% Polyester. Measures 5" H.

Title: Glad Tidings Introduction: September 2013
